data.title: Switzerland february Weather 2025: Forecast and temperature city by city
data.meta_description: Is the climate in Switzerland  in february good? Discover the weather forecast in february 2025 to prepare your trip.

Below, check out the weather forecast for the month of february for most popular cities in Switzerland. These forecasts are statistics for the month of february from weather reports for over 10 years. The percentage indicates the possibility of having the weather mentioned.

Where should you go in Switzerland in february when it comes to the weather?

Remember:

The climate in Switzerland in february is very bad across the board.

February is one of the worst month for traveling to Switzerland. The climate in Lucerne, Zurich, Lugano, Montreux, Fribourg, Sion, Lausanne, Interlaken, Bern, Basel, Geneva, Zermatt and Davos and everywhere in the country is ver bad. It's cold, the sun is not there all the time and you take the risk of getting wet by rain very often wherever you go.

Climate in Switzerland in february

Climate in Zurich in february

In the month of february, maximum temperature is 6°C and minimum temperature is -1°C (for an average temperature of 2°C). The climate is quite more than very fresh in that locality in february. Plan to cover you well! With 79mm over 5 days, you will experience some showers for your trip. But this is rather reasonably and it is only of temporary showers.

In the month of february, maximum temperature is 7°C and minimum temperature is -0°C (for an average temperature of 3°C). The climate is quite more than very fresh in that area in february. Bring warm clothes! With 101mm over 7 days, rain may occur throughout your trip. But this is moderate and it is only of temporary showers.

Climate in Bern in february

In the month of february, maximum temperature is 5°C and minimum temperature is -3°C (for an average temperature of 1°C). The climate is quite more than very fresh in that area in the month of february. Plan to cover you well! With 68mm over 5 days, you risk getting wet slightly during your trip. But this is pretty reasonably and you will not be too bothered by it.

Climate in Davos in february

In the month of february, the mean temperature in Davos is -6°C (maximum temperature is -2°C and minimum temperature is -10°C). The climate is rather cold here in this month. Plan a sweater! With 85mm over 6 days, you risk getting wet slightly throughout your vacations. But this is moderate and it is only of temporary showers.

Climate in Fribourg in february

In february, maximum temperature is 5°C and minimum temperature is -4°C (for an average temperature of 1°C). The climate is quite more than very fresh here in february. Bring warm clothes! With 137mm over 9 days, you will experience some showers during your trip. But this is rather moderate and it will not be continuous.

Weather data for Switzerland in february:

Weather data for Switzerland in february is derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Switzerland. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Switzerland can vary slightly from year to year, but these predictions should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags and check when is the best time to go to Switzerland.
